title: Sinkane Makes Music For An Open World
teaser: "The music that I make can be related to anybody all over the world," Sinkane's Ahmed Gallab says of his uprooted life, which informs a masterful blend of R&B, shoegaze, African and country music.
contentencoded:
For more conversations with music-makers, check out NPR's Music Interviews.
